name: WhiteSourceScanner
description: An Azure DevOps Build/Release Task to perform execute WhiteSource unified scanner
helpMarkDown: Information on how to use the task: [See repository](https://github.com/akuryan/vsts.extensions/tree/master/Analysis/WhiteSource)
author: Anton Kuryan

inputs.name: projectHaveConfig
inputs.label: Please, specify, if project have configuration file for WhiteSource.
inputs.helpMarkDown: If project do not have config file - default one will be downloaded and you will have possibility to specify some values in task

inputs.name: wssConfigPath
inputs.label: Path to WhiteSource config in project
inputs.helpMarkDown: If project have WhiteSource configuration file - it shall be specified here

inputs.name: fileScanPattern
inputs.label: File scan pattern:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma, space or line separated list of Ant-style GLOB patterns specifying which files to include in the scan.

inputs.name: wssApiKey
inputs.label: WhiteSource API key:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Unique identifier of the organization. Can be retrieved from the admin page in your WhiteSource account.

inputs.name: scannerTargetPath
inputs.label: Download scanner to:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter path on agent where scanner will be downloaded; if empty - it will be downloaded to temp folder.
